effect.name: Sonic Fade
effect.description: Fades an object in or out (to black), while applying two custom colors when fading. This effect is seen in the classic Sonic games.
effect.author: Looki

parameter.name: Time
parameter.description: A value between 0 and 1 that specifies the current time of the fade (0 = black, 1 = original).

parameter.name: First color
parameter.description: The color to fade to after black.

parameter.name: Second color
parameter.description: The color to fade to after the first color (and before white).
